attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently, there has been rumors, with reliable evidence that suggest there is another Planet within our Solar System.  Many believe the Goverment is trying to cover up such story, as they are true, with the result in this loss of human life.  Tell us one way or another, does 'Planet X' exist, therefore will put people straight, about what is going on, and what will happen.  WE HAVE THE RIGHT TO KNOW THE TRUTH.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
